Hacklahoma Registration.description: A heavily edited version of Quill, a registration system for attendees to register for a hackathon. This system was built for Hacklahoma and could be called Quill 2.0

Centrialized Emergency Relief System.description: Provides a way for volunteers and organizers to easily coordinate meetups for on-site cleanup, resource distribution, and donations without a middle-man

Hacklahoma Hub.description: An centrialized website for Hacklahoma displaying past events

White Shirts.description: A short film about an isolated man who is recruited into a cult
